text:
@SecAzar @WhiteHouse @POTUS Today's facts:
36,000,000 = Americans unemployed
1,413,350 = Americans COVID-19 positive
85,506 = American COVID-19 deaths
130 = American children COVID-19 related symptoms
#AmericansAreWatching
#WhereAreTheTests #WhereIsTheTestPlan #TestTraceIsolate
